title: Dantonio Burnette on prepping players for NFL, how NC State rookies will fit in (Football 07/05)
description:
Will Brinson is joined by NC State Assistant Athletic Director and Director of Strength and Conditioning Dantonio Burnette to talk about how he preps guys for the NFL in his program, the different technology they use in order to find an edge in developing players, how a class of 3-star recruits turned into an NFL draft class of seven players and much more.
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
